overview.ovdesc: This table will be updated once the Account has been moved to History.

desc.p: Hold the Account number which has been closed.
Holds the date on which the Account has been moved to History.
Contains the ID of the customer who owns the Account.
Contains the Account Officer responsible for the Account.
Holds the branch in which the Account existed.
Holds the reason for closing the Account which gets updated from ACCOUNT.CLOSURE record.
Holds the name of the user who has inputted the ACCOUNT.CLOSURE.
Holds the name of the user who has authorised ACCOUNT.CLOSURE.
Allowed values are ONLINE and Blank.
This will be updated as 'ONLINE' if the closure is online. It will remain blank for COB closure.
This field is used to hold the notes for the closing the Account.
